name: @functions-oneui/organism-action-panel
description: Composable action panel organism for OneUI.

scripts.build: node -e "require('node:fs').rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true })" && node ../../../scripts/run-if-available.mjs tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.test: pnpm --filter @functions-oneui/testing run build && node ../../../scripts/run-if-available.mjs vitest run --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.test:ui: pnpm --filter @functions-oneui/testing run build && node ../../../scripts/run-if-available.mjs vitest --config vitest.config.ts --ui
